docs.text: HTTPX OAuth ¶ Async OAuth client using HTTPX Documentation : https://frankie567.github.io/httpx-oauth/ Source Code : https://github.com/frankie567/httpx-oauth Development ¶ Setup environement ¶ You should have Pipenv installed. Then, you can install the dependencies with: pipenv install --dev After that, activate the virtual environment: pipenv shell Run unit tests ¶ You can run all the tests with: make test Alternatively, you can run pytest yourself: pytest Format the code ¶ Execute the following command to apply isort and black formatting: make format License ¶ This project is licensed under the terms of the MIT license.
